net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.data

Interface DragAndDropTreeModel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TreeModel

    public interface DragAndDropTreeModel
extends TreeModel
    Defines the interface for providing drag and drop on tree model nodes and cells. For row level drag and drop see RowModel. A tree model that is to take part in drag and drop operations at the node and/or cell level must implement this interface in addition to TreeModel.
    Author:
    Pat Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DragSource getDragSourceAt(TreePath path, int columnIndex)
      Returns the DragSource for the cell at columnIndex and path.
      DropTarget getDropTargetAt(TreePath path, int columnIndex)
      Returns the DropTarget for the cell at columnIndex and path.

    • Method Detail

      • getDragSourceAt

        DragSource getDragSourceAt(TreePath path,
                         int columnIndex)
        Returns the DragSource for the cell at columnIndex and path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the node.
        columnIndex - The index of the column, zero being the first column.
        Returns:
        DragSource or null.

      • getDropTargetAt

        DropTarget getDropTargetAt(TreePath path,
                         int columnIndex)
        Returns the DropTarget for the cell at columnIndex and path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the node.
        columnIndex - The index of the column, zero being the first column.
        Returns:
        DropTarget or null.
